name: BSA Pharma
overview:
Established in the year 2002, at Ambala ( Haryana, India ), we “BSA Pharma Inc.”, are engaged inmanufacturing, trading and supplying a qualitative assortment of Tablet, Capsule, Syrup and Injections.

Why Us?: We have emerged as one of the renowned companies engaged in marketing, trading and supplying a wide range of Tablet, Capsule, Syrup, Injection and Herbal products. Our superior quality range has gained huge appreciation by our esteemed clients and helps us carve the niche for ourselves in the medical fraternity.

One stop solution for the PCD / Franchise / Pharma Marketing Entrepreneurs. Latest DCGI approved molecules Monopoly rights All products are excise duty free Competitive rates, excellent packing of all the products No minimum investment norms. You can start your business at a very low investment The company productions are in ISO 9001:2008 certified / WHO / GMP certified units

Client Statisfiction: As a quality centric firm, we strictly adhere to the quality control procedures that starts right from the production process to the dispatch of the finished product. Owing to our quality control procedures, we have earned the trust and confidence of the clients that are spread all across the nation.

Our Products: Co Enzyme Q-10 Enzyme Preparation Haematinic Muscle Relexant Oesteoporosis Medicine Protein Supplement Steroid Miscellaneous Ayurvedic Medicine
